title: Amazon's Middlewomen
description:
Why so many Amazon packages take a pitstop in the small town of Roundup, Montana.

Featuring
Josh Dzieza - @joshdzieza
Jason Del Rey - @DelRey

Links to resources discussed:
The everything town in the middle of nowhere
Land of the Giants: The Rise of Amazon

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:
Newsletter: Recode Daily 
Twitter: @Recode
